# Oatmeal Cookies

## Ingredients

* 1 cup sugar
* 2 cups flour
* 0.5 tsp baking soda
* 1 tsp vanilla
* 1 cup chopped nuts
* 1 cup margarine
* 2 cups oatmeal (NOT instant!)
* 3 eggs
* 0.5 tsp cinnamon
* 1 cup dates (or rasins, dried cranberries, etc)

## Instructions

Cream magraine and sugar. Add eggs and mix. Add dry ingredients and mix. Add nuts and dried fruit. Drop about 1 tsp size cookin on greased cookie sheets. Bake 350&deg;F until done - about 10-15 minutes, depending on the size of hte cookie.
